signals.problem_statement: The customer is struggling with email distribution and delegation within a shared inbox, leading to duplicated work and inefficiencies.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing a shared inbox for household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a system that allows real-time visibility and collaboration on email assignments to avoid confusion and ensure accountability.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing a shared inbox for household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for AI functionalities to help shorten tasks and improve email management efficiency.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing a shared inbox for household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to avoid network delays and ensure that all team members can see who is handling which emails in real-time.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing a shared inbox for household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to categorize and track emails effectively to manage workload and improve response times.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing a shared inbox for household-related emails.
